data.eml:eml: A remarkable new Coenosiini genus (Diptera, Muscidae) from Colombian Páramos

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fogaça, João M., Couri, Márcia S., Pérez, Sandra, De Carvalho, Claudio J. B. (2019): A remarkable new Coenosiini genus (Diptera, Muscidae) from Colombian Páramos. Zootaxa 4608 (2): 380-388, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4608.2.12
